iss.description: Issuer of the token. Required. The system that is generating/signing the JWT

sub.description: Subject of the token. Required. This value is the id of the actor taking the action. If actor is specified in this JWT, this value must match the actor's id.

aud.description: Audience of the token. Required. Can be a single string or an array of strings. Must be the name of the auth proxy service or services this token is valid for. Possible values: api, admin-api, public

exp.description: Unix timestamp of when the token expires. Required if nonce is present.

jti.description: JWT ID. Optional. Not used by Auth Proxy.
